title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]更多乐器
author: 174--3Q
txt_content:
MusicCraft  MOD
原帖：
http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/musiccraft-add-playable-instruments-to-minecraft/
------------------------------------------------------------分割线---------------------------------------------------------------------
  原文：
Hello! 
I am here to present you my own mod: MusicCraft. 
It adds playable, real instruments to the game. 
What instruments? 
- Grand pianos 
- Pianos 
- Small pianos :P 
- Guitars (5 colors) 
- Basses 
- Drum kits (5 colors) 
- Violins 
- Saxophones 
- Trumpets 
- And amplifiers to get Rock, distorted sound for guitars! :D 
-Organs 
-Keyboards! 
-Cellos! 
You can play these with your mouse, or even keyboard! 
I hope you like my work :) 


*IMPORTANT* 
In MusicCraft for Minecraft 1.7+ Im rewriting the instruments, so they are coming back partially! 
All instruments in this version of minecraft work in MULTIPLAYER, as well as SP. :) 
Available instruments in MusicCraft for Minecraft 1.7+: 
- Pianos, grand pianos and small pianos! 
- Drum kits! 
- Guitars! 
- Trees are back, too! 
- Keyboards! 
- Organs! 
- Xylophones! 
- Basses! 
- Cellos! 


If you like it, comment, give a diamond, and, of course, download! :) 


The mod requires FORGE! 


翻译（不是很准。。）
你好！
我在这里提出你自己的国防部：musiccraft。它增加了可玩的游戏，真正的仪器。什么乐器？钢琴-钢琴小钢琴：P-吉他（5色）低音提琴-鼓包（5色）-小提琴-萨克斯-喇叭和放大器获得的岩石，扭曲的吉他声！：D器官-键盘！-大提琴！你可以把这些与您的鼠标或键盘！我希望你喜欢我的工作：）*注意*在musiccraft至于Minecraft 1.7 +我重写工具，所以他们回来的部分！在这个版本的游戏Minecraft工作所有的仪器，以及sp.）在Minecraft 1.7 + musiccraft可用的工具：钢琴，钢琴和小钢琴！-鼓包！-吉他！树回来了，太！-键盘！器官！-木琴！低音提琴！-大提琴！如果你喜欢它，评论，给一个钻石，和，当然，下载！：）国防部需要伪造！

支持原作者0.0
